mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_PETSONAL.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TBL_PETSONAL(ID, PET_ID, PETSONAL_CHIC, PETSONAL_CUTE, PETSONAL_CALM, PETSONAL_ACTIVE, PETSONAL_LAZY, PETSONAL_DILIGENT, PETSONAL_COWARD,PETSONAL_BRAVE) VALUES (SEQ_PETSONAL.NEXTVAL, #{petId}, #{petsonalChic}, #{petsonalCute}, #{petsonalCalm}, #{petsonalActive}, #{petsonalLazy}, #{petsonalDiligent}, #{petsonalCoward}, #{petsonalBrave})
mapper.select: SELECT TPS.ID, PET_ID, PETSONAL_CHIC, PETSONAL_CUTE, PETSONAL_CALM, PETSONAL_ACTIVE, PETSONAL_LAZY, PETSONAL_DILIGENT, PETSONAL_COWARD,PETSONAL_BRAVE, PET_IMAGE, PET_NAME, PET_KIND, PET_GENDER, PET_BREED, PET_BIRTH, PET_WEIGHT, PET_NEUTER, PET_VET FROM TBL_PETSONAL TPS JOIN TBL_PET TP ON TPS.PET_ID = TP.ID WHERE PET_ID = #{petId}
